replies.body: Pretty sure they said something like "urf will be random champs".

> [{quoted}](name=Rengorax,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=NAsgtAOQ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-05T14:10:46.233+0000)
>
> Pretty sure they said something like "urf will be random champs" which will suck.

no. it will be less cancerous and more fun. Urf was ruined by rgm because every single game had same champs, you never saw more than 20 or so different champs, no1 likes same thing over and over
It would be so good if urf was a regular league mode

> [{quoted}](name=iAkeno,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=NAsgtAOQ,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-09-06T02:18:52.738+0000)
>
> It would be so good if urf was a regular league mode

no it wouldn't, it hasnt been back on the rgm for no long because it was cancerous and repetitive, never saw more than the same 20 champs
Eh urf bores me anyway. Best decision riot made ever is making urf random.

> [{quoted}](name=hippy,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=NAsgtAOQ,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-09-05T23:10:13.772+0000)
>
> Eh urf bores me anyway. Best decision riot made ever is making urf random.

agree
The more you bitch and whinge the quicker it will be put in the rotation!

> [{quoted}](name=Knuuckles,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=NAsgtAOQ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-09-05T15:09:44.944+0000)
>
> The more you bitch and whinge the quicker it will be put in the rotation!

yes, the most effective method. i heard it still works after 3 years!!

URF is coming back on the weekend of the 24th, so about 2.5 weeks to go. But it will be ARAM urf. The normal URF probably wont see a 3rd go round this year, I would be surprised if it did.
I don't think it matters how much the community beg and moan for something (like URF), ultimately if they don't want it there it ain't going to happen.

> [{quoted}](name=Sloth Almighty,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=NAsgtAOQ,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-09-05T22:07:24.689+0000)
>
> URF is coming back on the weekend of the 24th, so about 2.5 weeks to go. But it will be ARAM urf. The normal URF probably wont see a 3rd go round this year, I would be surprised if it did.
> I don't think it matters how much the community beg and moan for something (like URF), ultimately if they don't want it there it ain't going to happen.

Translation. Go DOtA!
Woah woah woah, hold up there son. Let's not start a vigilante now.
Why are rito continuing to be the scum in uncleaned toilet bowls and playing every map bar the good ones?
